Package org.bluez.v4

Interface Summary
Adapter BlueZ V4 D-Bus Adapter API Adapter hierarchy
Agent BlueZ V4 D-Bus Agent API Agent hierarchy
Device BlueZ V4 D-Bus Device API Service hierarchy
Manager BlueZ V4 D-Bus Manager API Manager hierarchy
Service BlueZ V4 D-Bus Service API Service hierarchy
 

Class Summary
Adapter.DeviceCreated Parameter is object path of created device.
Adapter.DeviceDisappeared This signal will be send when an inquiry session for a periodic discovery finishes and previously found devices are no longer in range or visible.
Adapter.DeviceFound This signal will be send every time an inquiry result has been found by the service daemon.
Adapter.DeviceRemoved Parameter is object path of removed device.
Adapter.PropertyChanged This signal indicates a changed value of the given property.
BlueZAPIV4 Access BlueZ v4 over D-Bus
Device.DisconnectRequested This signal will be sent when a low level disconnection to a remote device has been requested.
Device.NodeCreated Parameter is object path of created device node.
Device.NodeRemoved Parameter is object path of removed device node.
Device.PropertyChanged This signal indicates a changed value of the given property.
Manager.AdapterAdded Parameter is object path of added adapter.
Manager.AdapterRemoved Parameter is object path of removed adapter.
Manager.DefaultAdapterChanged Parameter is object path of the new default adapter.
Manager.PropertyChanged This signal indicates a changed value of the given property.

Adapter.Properties  
Device.Properties  
Manager.Properties
